name: Automotive Body Repair Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that perform automotive body repair work. Such
merchants also may or may not paint automobiles in conjunction
with the body repair work.
For merchants that primarily paint automobiles, use MCC 7535.
For merchants that perform automotive repair work other than body
repair, use MCC 7538.
